All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AccessCheckService
A service that provides methods for checking if a specified User has specific privileges.
AggregateCardQueryRepository
A persistence interface used exclusively to provide a composable interface pattern.
AggregateCardQueryRepositoryImpl
The implementation of AggregateCardQueryRepository.
AggregateGetQueryParams
A container for parameters used in pagination / sorting / filter aggregate GET queries.
Auditable<U extends String>
An abstract class extended by entity classes that allows them to automatically persist audit information for their stored interfaces.
AuditorAwareImpl
The implementation of AuditorAware that we use in our application.
BadDateFormatException
A RuntimeException thrown in cases of a bad date format provided by the user.
CardController
Controller for querying the API for CardDto instances.
CardControllerUnitTests
Unit tests for CardController.
CardDto
DTO class for Cards.
CardEntity
DB entity class for cards.
CardModelAssembler
A class that uses SpringHATEOAS static methods to render links to related resources for cards.
CardNameCannotBeBlankException
A RuntimeException thrown by PATCH requests when the user tries to update the name of a card to the empty string.
CardNameNotProvidedException
A RuntimeException instance thrown in POST Card requests when the user has not provided a name for the card.
CardNotFoundException
A RuntimeException thrown when a card with a given ID cannot be found in the DB.
CardRepository
A composed persistence repository used by the service layer to persist CardEntity instances.
CardsApplication
Central Spring Boot application class.
CardsApplicationIntegrationTests
Integration tests for the application.
CardService
A service that provides the core of the API functionality.
CardServiceUnitTests
Unit tests for CardService.
CardStatus
A simple enum denoting the status of a card.
ComponentLogger
AOP-enabled class that logs all calls to public methods of repositories annotated with Logged.
Constants
Global named constants useful for our application.
EmailAlreadyInDatabaseException
A RuntimeException thrown when the user tries to register with a username that already exists in the database.
ExceptionAdvice
RestControllerAdvice for all our custom exceptions, and some non-custom ones, too.
ExceptionMessageContainer
A simple message container to allow exception handlers to be rendered by clients in JSON format.
InsufficientPrivilegesException
A RuntimeException thrown when a user attempts to perform an action for which they have insufficient privileges (e.g accessing the cards of a different member user or an admin).
InvalidSortByFieldException
A RuntimeException thrown in paginated queries when the user provides an invalid field to sort by.
JpaConfig
Configuration class right now used only for providing a bean of type AuditorAware.
JwtAuthenticationController
Controller for user authentication.
JwtAuthenticationEntryPoint
Defines the default API response for unauthenticated calls to any endpoint.
JwtAuthenticationService
A service class that provides a single authentication method for users.
JwtAuthenticationServiceUnitTests
Unit tests for JwtAuthenticationService.
JwtRequest
Simple POJO for defining a user request for a JWT token.
JwtRequestFilter
A OncePerRequestFilter that filters every incoming request to make sure that it is properly authenticated with an unexpired JWT token.
JwtResponse
Simple POJO that defines the API's response to the user for a JWT token request.
JwtTokenUtil
Various utilities for generating and parsing JWTs.
JwtUserDetailsService
Service class that talks to the database to retrieve and store user information.
JwtUserDetailsServiceUnitTests
Unit tests for JwtUserDetailsService.
Loc
Simple enum used by MethodLoggingMessages to log entrance or exit from methods.
Logged
An empty interface that we decorate classes for which we want to log the entrance and exit (gracious or otherwise) to its methods.
MethodLoggingMessages
final class whose static methods are used by ComponentLogger classes to log their messages.
PaginationTestRunner<T,U>
A class that facilitates testing of pagination / sorting / filtering queries.
PasswordEncoderConfig
Defines a Spring Bean of type PasswordEncoder for the various components to use.
PatchMapper
A Mapper used by PATCH logic to map the fields of a CardDto onto a CardEntity just pulled from the database.
SecurityConfig
Spring Security configuration for API.
SortOrder
A simple enum used in pagination/sorting queries to designate ascending or descending sort order for a given field.
TestUtils
Various constants and helper methods for our tests.
TimeZoneConfig
Configuring the default timezone used by the Spring app.
UserDto
DTO class for Users.
UserEntity
Database object for application users.
UserRepository
A JpaRepository used to persist UserEntity instances.
UserRole
Enum that defines the two possible user categories for our application: members and admins.
Utilities
Static Utility methods used by our application.
